sentence.Network_en: Why did he choose these pale, nerveless, uninteresting people?
sentence.Network_cn: 他为什么选了这么些脸色苍白、有气无力而又无聊乏味的人？

sentence.Network_en: The knife fell from her nerveless fingers.
sentence.Network_cn: 刀从她无力的手里落下。

sentence.Network_en: The knife fell from her nerveless fingers.
sentence.Network_cn: 刀子从她那无力的手中落下.

英语单词中以 -less 结尾的单词 -... ... loveless 无爱情的, 不可爱的 nerveless 无力的,松懈的 eyeless 无眼的,盲目的.

means.word_mean: 1. marked by calm self-control (especially in trying circumstances); unemotional;

sentences.sentence: "the most nerveless winner in the history of the tournament"
"a weak, nerveless fool, devoid of energy and promptitude"- Nathaniel Hawthorne

auth_sentence.content: They were brave and nerveless, focused yet generous.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were brave and nerveless, focused yet generous.

auth_sentence.content: Weir by contrast had been utterly nerveless in compiling a bogey-free 68.
auth_sentence.res_content: Weir by contrast had been utterly nerveless in compiling a bogey-free 68.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Weir by contrast had been utterly nerveless in compiling a bogey-free 68.

auth_sentence.content: A nerveless diplomatist who only has to be menaced and he will yield.

stems_affixes.word_buile: bound边界+less无……的→adj.无限的,无边无际的
care关心+less无……的,不……的→不关心→粗心的,疏忽的
color颜色+less无……的,不……的→adj.无色的
doubt怀疑+less无……的,不……的→adj. 无疑的,确定的
effort努力+less无……的,不……的→adj.不费力的
fathom测量深度;长度单位[6英尺]+less无……的,不……的→没法测量→深不可测的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fault犯错误,欺骗+less无……的,不……的→adj.无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
feck价值,效果+less无……的,不……的→adj.无目标无计划的
flaw瑕疵+less无……的,不……的→adj.完美的,无瑕疵的
grace优美,文雅+less无……的,不……的→adj.粗俗的
hap机会,运气+less无→无运气的
help帮助+less无……的,不……的→adj.无助的,无能的,没用的
home家+less无……的,不……的→adj.无家可归的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+less无……的,不……的→adj.没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
nerve神经,胆量,勇气+less无……的,不……的→adj.无力的,无勇气的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
relent变宽厚,变温和+less无……的,不……的→adj.无情的,残酷的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的

spine脊骨,书脊+less无……的,不……的→没骨气的
tire疲劳,劳累+less无……的,不……的→adj.不疲劳的
value价值+less无……的,不……的→adj.不足道的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
